LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.ChristmasStockings.New: New Year is here. {0} can be interacted again.
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.ChristmasStockings.Rea: Passage is not available till next New Year
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.ChristmasStockings.Ale: Christmas Tree passage is freezing up
Passage through the Christmas Tree is slowly freezing up. After few days it will prevent us from accessing the other side of the tree.\n[Will destroy the map]
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.ChristmasStockings.Let: Your colonists reached the celebration spot. Survive the cold and trial to acquire gifts.\n\nYou have 5 days to finish celebrating till the temperature drop and freeze the passage back.
